00023 public function init()
00024     {
00025  $this->objouputtext = $this->getObject('language_module','hosportal');
00026  //Instantiate the language object
00027  $this->objDBComments = $this->getObject('dbhosportal_messages','hosportal');

00029   $this->objbuildform = $this->getObject('form_module','hosportal');
00030      //instatiate HTML table module object

00040  $this->objSwitchMenu = $this->getObject('switchmenu_module','hosportal');
00041 
00042 $this->objDropDownMenu = $this->getObject('dropdown_module', 'hosportal');
00043   //load button object
00044   $this->objBuildButton = $this->getObject('button_module','hosportal');
00045     //Load text input object
00046   $this->objTitle = $this->getObject('textinput_module','hosportal');
00047   //Load label object
00048   $this->objLabel = $this->getObject('label_module','hosportal');

00060 protected function setUpNoOfMessagesDropDownOption()
00061 {
00062 
00063    // $dd= $this->getObject('dropdown', 'htmlelements');
00064    $this->objDropDownMenu->createNewObjectFromModule('noOfMessagesDropDown');
00065    //=&new dropdown('noOfMessagesDropDown');
00066   // $dd->addOption()    will add a blank option
00067 for ($x=2;$x<11;$x++)
00068 {
00069      $this->objDropDownMenu->insertOptionIntoDropDown($x,$x);
00070 }
00071 //$this->objDropDownMenu->setBreakSpace('&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;');
00072 //$this->objDropDownMenu->addOption('1','2');
00073 //   $this->objDropDownMenu->addOption('2','5');
00074    $this->objDropDownMenu->setDefaultOptionForDropDown(4);
00075   return $this->objDropDownMenu->showBuildDropDownMenu();
00076 
00077 //$this->objDropDownMenu->setSelected($this->getSession('mydropdown'));
00078 }
00079 
00080 protected function setSortAuthorAscLink($action = 'sortnview', $idSubjectMatter=NULL, $noOfMessages = 1)
00081 {
00082     $lnkSortAuthorAsc = $this->objouputtext->insertTextFromConfigFile("mod_hosportal_sortauthoracs");
00083 
00084     $mngSortAuthorAscLink = $this->objLink->createNewObjectFromModule($this->uri(array(
00085     'module'=>'hosportal',
00086     'action'=>$action,
00087     'sortOptions' => "sortAuthorsAscendingOrder",
00088      'idSubjectMatter'=> $idSubjectMatter,
00089         'pageNumber' => 0,
00090         'noOfMessages'=> $noOfMessages,
00091         'searchBoolean' => false
00092    )));
00093      $mngSortAuthorAscLink = $this->objLink->embedLinkToObject($lnkSortAuthorAsc) ;
00094    return  $link1Manage = $mngSortAuthorAscLink = $this->objLink->showLink();
00095 }
00096
